verses.verse: At that <S%G2540>time<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4198>went<s%> on the <S%G4521>Sabbath<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G4702>grainfields,<s%> and His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> became <S%G3983>hungry<s%> and <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G5089>pick<s%> the <S%G4719>heads<s%> [of grain] and <S%G2068>eat.<s%>

But when the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G3708>saw<s%> it, they <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> Your <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> is not <S%G1832>lawful<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> on a <S%G4521>Sabbath.<s%>"

But He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "Have you not <S%G314>read<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G7035>David<s%> <S%G4160>did,<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> he became <S%G3983>hungry,<s%> he and his <S%G3588>companions<s%><S%G3326>;<s%>

<S%G4459>how<s%> he <S%G1525>entered<s%> the <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and they <S%G2068>ate<s%> the <S%G4286>consecrated<s%> <S%G740>bread,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> was not <S%G1832>lawful<s%> for him to <S%G2068>eat,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> for <S%G3588>those<s%> with him, but for the <S%G2409>priests<s%> <S%G3441>alone<s%>?

<S%G2228>"Or<s%> have you not <S%G314>read<s%> in the <S%G3551>Law,<s%> that on the <S%G4521>Sabbath<s%> the <S%G2409>priests<s%> in the <S%G2413>temple<s%> <S%G953>break<s%> the <S%G4521>Sabbath,<s%> and are <S%G338>innocent<s%>?
"But I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, that something <S%G3173>greater<s%> than the <S%G2413>temple<s%> is <S%G5602>here.<s%>

"But <S%G1487>if<s%> you had <S%G1097>known<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> this <S%G1510>means,<s%> 'I <S%G2309>desire<s%> <S%G1656>compassion,<s%> and not a <S%G2378>sacrifice,<s%>' you would not have <S%G2613>condemned<s%> the <S%G338>innocent.<s%>
"For the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> is <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of the <S%G4521>Sabbath.<s%>"
And <S%G3327>departing<s%> from <S%G1564>there,<s%> He <S%G2064>went<s%> into their <S%G4864>synagogue.<s%>

And <S%G2400>behold,<s%> [there was] a <S%G444>man<s%> with a <S%G3584>withered<s%> <S%G5495>hand.<s%> And they <S%G1905>questioned<s%> Him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "Is it <S%G1832>lawful<s%> to <S%G2323>heal<s%> on the <S%G4521>Sabbath<s%>?" â€“ in <S%G2443>order<s%> that they might <S%G2723>accuse<s%> Him.

And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5101>"What<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> shall there be <S%G1537>among<s%> you, <S%G3739>who<s%> shall <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4263>sheep,<s%> and <S%G1437>if<s%> it <S%G1706>falls<s%> into a <S%G999>pit<s%> on the <S%G4521>Sabbath,<s%> will he not <S%G2902>take<s%> <S%G2902>hold<s%> of it, and <S%G1453>lift<s%> it out?

"Of <S%G4214>how<s%> <S%G4214>much<s%> <S%G1308>more<s%> <S%G1308>value<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> is a <S%G444>man<s%> than a <S%G4263>sheep!<s%> <S%G5620>So<s%> <S%G5620>then,<s%> it is <S%G1832>lawful<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2573>good<s%> on the <S%G4521>Sabbath.<s%>"

<S%G5119>Then<s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G1614>"Stretch<s%> out your <S%G5495>hand!<s%>" And he <S%G1614>stretched<s%> it out, and it was <S%G600>restored<s%> to <S%G5199>normal,<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> the <S%G243>other.<s%>

But the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> out, and <S%G4824>counseled<s%> <S%G2983><s%> <S%G4824>together<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> Him, [as to] <S%G3704>how<s%> they might <S%G622>destroy<s%> Him.
But <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G1097>aware<s%> of [this,] <S%G402>withdrew<s%> from <S%G1564>there.<s%> And <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> Him, and He <S%G2323>healed<s%> them <S%G3956>all,<s%>
and <S%G2008>warned<s%> them not to <S%G4160>make<s%> Him <S%G5318>known,<s%>
in <S%G2443>order<s%> that <S%G3588>what<s%> was <S%G3004>spoken<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2268>Isaiah<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet,<s%> might be <S%G4137>fulfilled,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%>

<S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> My <S%G3816>Servant<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> I have <S%G140>chosen;<s%> My <S%G27>Beloved<s%> in <S%G3739>whom<s%> My <S%G5590>soul<s%> is well-pleased; I will <S%G5087>put<s%> My <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> upon Him, And He shall <S%G518>proclaim<s%> <S%G2920>justice<s%> to the <S%G1484>Gentiles.<s%>
"He will not <S%G2051>quarrel,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> <S%G2905>cry<s%> out; <S%G3761>Nor<s%> will <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G191>hear<s%> His <S%G5456>voice<s%> in the <S%G4116>streets.<s%>

"A <S%G4937>battered<s%> <S%G2563>reed<s%> He will not <S%G2608>break<s%> off, And a <S%G5188>smoldering<s%> <S%G3043>wick<s%> He will not <S%G4570>put<s%> out, <S%G2193>Until<s%> He <S%G1544>leads<s%> <S%G2920>justice<s%> to <S%G3534>victory.<s%>
"And in His <S%G3686>name<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> will <S%G1679>hope.<s%>"

<S%G5119>Then<s%> there was <S%G4374>brought<s%> to Him a demon-possessed man [who was] <S%G5185>blind<s%> and <S%G2974>dumb,<s%> and He <S%G2323>healed<s%> him, <S%G5620>so<s%> that the <S%G2974>dumb<s%> <S%G2974>man<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> and <S%G991>saw.<s%>

And <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> were <S%G1839>amazed,<s%> and [began] to <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G3778>"This<s%> [man] <S%G3385>cannot<s%> be the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G7035>David,<s%> can he?"

But when the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> it, they <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3778>"This<s%> <S%G3778>man<s%> <S%G1544>casts<s%> out <S%G1140>demons<s%> <S%G3756>only<s%> <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3361><s%> by <S%G954>Beelzebul<s%> the <S%G758>ruler<s%> of the <S%G1140>demons.<s%>"

And <S%G3609>knowing<s%> their <S%G1761>thoughts<s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G3956>"Any<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> <S%G3307>divided<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G1438>itself<s%> is <S%G2049>laid<s%> <S%G2049>waste;<s%> and <S%G3956>any<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3614>house<s%> <S%G3307>divided<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G1438>itself<s%> shall not <S%G2476>stand<s%>.

"And <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> <S%G1544>casts<s%> out <S%G4567>Satan,<s%> he is <S%G3307>divided<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G1438>himself;<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> shall his <S%G932>kingdom<s%> <S%G2476>stand<s%>?

"And <S%G1487>if<s%> I by <S%G954>Beelzebul<s%> <S%G1544>cast<s%> out <S%G1140>demons,<s%> by <S%G5101>whom<s%> do your <S%G5207>sons<s%> <S%G1544>cast<s%> them out? <S%G1223>Consequently<s%> <S%G3778><s%> they shall be your <S%G2923>judges.<s%>

"But <S%G1487>if<s%> I <S%G1544>cast<s%> out <S%G1140>demons<s%> by the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G5348>come<s%> upon you.

<S%G2228>"Or<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> the <S%G2478>strong<s%> man's <S%G3614>house<s%> and <S%G726>carry<s%> <S%G726>off<s%> his <S%G4632>property,<s%> <S%G1437>unless<s%> <S%G3361><s%> he <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G1210>binds<s%> the <S%G2478>strong<s%> [man]? And <S%G5119>then<s%> he will <S%G1283>plunder<s%> his <S%G3614>house.<s%>
"He who is not with Me is <S%G2596>against<s%> Me; and he who does not <S%G4863>gather<s%> with Me <S%G4650>scatters.<s%>

<S%G1223>"Therefore<s%> <S%G3778><s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G3956>any<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> and <S%G988>blasphemy<s%> shall be <S%G863>forgiven<s%> <S%G444>men,<s%> but <S%G988>blasphemy<s%> against the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> shall not be <S%G863>forgiven.<s%>

"And <S%G3739>whoever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> shall <S%G3004>speak<s%> a <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man,<s%> it shall be <S%G863>forgiven<s%> him; but <S%G3739>whoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> shall <S%G3004>speak<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> it shall not be <S%G863>forgiven<s%> him, <S%G3777>either<s%> in <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G165>age,<s%> <S%G3777>or<s%> in the [age] to <S%G3195>come.<s%>

<S%G2228>"Either<s%> <S%G4160>make<s%> the <S%G1186>tree<s%> <S%G2570>good,<s%> and its <S%G2590>fruit<s%> <S%G2570>good;<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4160>make<s%> the <S%G1186>tree<s%> <S%G4550>bad,<s%> and its <S%G2590>fruit<s%> <S%G4550>bad;<s%> for the <S%G1186>tree<s%> is <S%G1097>known<s%> by its <S%G2590>fruit.<s%>

"You <S%G1081>brood<s%> of <S%G2191>vipers,<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> you, <S%G1510>being<s%> <S%G4190>evil,<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%> what is <S%G18>good<s%>? For the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G2980>speaks<s%> out of that <S%G4051>which<s%> <S%G4051>fills<s%> the <S%G2588>heart.<s%>

"The <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> out of [his] <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2344>treasure<s%> <S%G1544>brings<s%> <S%G1544>forth<s%> what is <S%G18>good;<s%> and the <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> out of [his] <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G2344>treasure<s%> <S%G1544>brings<s%> <S%G1544>forth<s%> what is <S%G4190>evil.<s%>

"And I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, that <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G692>careless<s%> <S%G4487>word<s%> that <S%G444>men<s%> shall <S%G2980>speak,<s%> they shall <S%G591>render<s%> <S%G3056>account<s%> for it in the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G2920>judgment.<s%>
"For by your <S%G3056>words<s%> you shall be <S%G1344>justified,<s%> and by your <S%G3056>words<s%> you shall be <S%G2613>condemned.<s%>"

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> of the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> and <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> Him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1320>"Teacher,<s%> we <S%G2309>want<s%> to <S%G3708>see<s%> a <S%G4592>sign<s%> from You."

But He <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "An <S%G4190>evil<s%> and <S%G3428>adulterous<s%> <S%G1074>generation<s%> <S%G1934>craves<s%> for a <S%G4592>sign;<s%> and [yet] <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G4592>sign<s%> shall be <S%G1325>given<s%> to it but the <S%G4592>sign<s%> of <S%G2495>Jonah<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet;<s%>

for <S%G5618>just<s%> as <S%G2495>Jonah<s%> was <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> and <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G3571>nights<s%> in the <S%G2836>belly<s%> of the <S%G2785>sea<s%> <S%G2785>monster,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> shall the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> be <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> and <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G3571>nights<s%> in the <S%G2588>heart<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth.<s%>

"The <S%G435>men<s%> of <S%G3536>Nineveh<s%> shall <S%G450>stand<s%> up with <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1074>generation<s%> at the <S%G2920>judgment,<s%> and shall <S%G2632>condemn<s%> it <S%G3754>because<s%> they <S%G3340>repented<s%> at the <S%G2782>preaching<s%> of <S%G2495>Jonah;<s%> and <S%G2400>behold,<s%> something <S%G4183>greater<s%> than <S%G2495>Jonah<s%> is <S%G5602>here.<s%>

"[The] <S%G938>Queen<s%> of [the] <S%G3558>South<s%> shall <S%G1453>rise<s%> up with <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1074>generation<s%> at the <S%G2920>judgment<s%> and shall <S%G2632>condemn<s%> it, <S%G3754>because<s%> she <S%G2064>came<s%> from the <S%G4009>ends<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> to <S%G191>hear<s%> the <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> of <S%G4672>Solomon;<s%> and <S%G2400>behold,<s%> something <S%G4183>greater<s%> than <S%G4672>Solomon<s%> is <S%G5602>here.<s%>

<S%G1161>"Now<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> the <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G1831>goes<s%> out of a <S%G444>man,<s%> it <S%G1330>passes<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G504>waterless<s%> <S%G5117>places,<s%> <S%G2212>seeking<s%> <S%G372>rest,<s%> and does not <S%G2147>find<s%> [it.]

<S%G5119>"Then<s%> it <S%G3004>says,<s%> 'I will <S%G1994>return<s%> to my <S%G3624>house<s%> from <S%G3606>which<s%> I <S%G1831>came<s%>'; and when it <S%G2064>comes,<s%> it <S%G2147>finds<s%> it <S%G4980>unoccupied,<s%> <S%G4563>swept,<s%> and <S%G2885>put<s%> in <S%G2885>order.<s%>

<S%G5119>"Then<s%> it <S%G4198>goes,<s%> and <S%G3880>takes<s%> <S%G3880>along<s%> with it <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2087>other<s%> <S%G4151>spirits<s%> <S%G4190>more<s%> <S%G4190>wicked<s%> than <S%G1438>itself,<s%> and they <S%G1525>go<s%> in and <S%G2730>live<s%> <S%G1563>there;<s%> and the <S%G2078>last<s%> state of that <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1096>becomes<s%> <S%G5501>worse<s%> than the <S%G4413>first.<s%> That is the <S%G3779>way<s%> it will <S%G2532>also<s%> be with <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G1074>generation.<s%>"

While He was <S%G2089>still<s%> <S%G2980>speaking<s%> to the <S%G3793>multitudes,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> His <S%G3384>mother<s%> and <S%G80>brothers<s%> were <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G1854>outside,<s%> <S%G2212>seeking<s%> to <S%G2980>speak<s%> to Him.

And <S%G5100>someone<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> Your <S%G3384>mother<s%> and Your <S%G80>brothers<s%> are <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G1854>outside<s%> <S%G2212>seeking<s%> to <S%G2980>speak<s%> to You."
But He <S%G611>answered<s%> the one who was <S%G3004>telling<s%> Him and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5101>"Who<s%> is My <S%G3384>mother<s%> and <S%G5101>who<s%> are My <S%G80>brothers<s%>?"
And <S%G1614>stretching<s%> out His <S%G5495>hand<s%> <S%G1909>toward<s%> His <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> He <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> My <S%G3384>mother<s%> and My <S%G80>brothers!<s%>

"For <S%G3748>whoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G4160>does<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of My <S%G3962>Father<s%> who is in <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> he is My <S%G80>brother<s%> and <S%G79>sister<s%> and <S%G3384>mother.<s%>"
